mapper.select:
select er.id, er.name, er.nationality, er.images, er.sex, er.political_status, er.native_place, er.employer, er.`position`, er.address, er.phone, er.level_one, er.level_two, er.birth_date, er.job_title, er.special_appellation, er.mail, er.fixed_telephone, er.profile, er.create_date, er.recommend_name, er.status from expert_recommend er where 1 = 1
AND er.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{recommend.expertName},'%')
AND er.position LIKE CONCAT('%',#{recommend.position},'%')
order by er.create_date desc
